thread.title: Under Armour Posts Revenue, Profit Growth and Raises Guidance
thread.title_full: Under Armour Posts Revenue, Profit Growth and Raises Guidance - WSJ

author: Ezequiel Minaya
title: Under Armour Posts Revenue, Profit Growth and Raises Guidance
text:
Under Armour Inc. posted revenue gains of 28% in its latest quarter on strong footwear and apparel sales.
The robust growth led the surging brand to raise its full-year guidance for revenue growth Thursday to 27% from 25%.
The Baltimore-based company passed Adidas AG of Germany last year to become the second-ranked seller of sports... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
